languages.text: "Это не жизнь, Идира. Лучше прожить отведенный срок по своим правилам, чем провести вечность так, как собралась это сделать ты!"
"This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"
languages.original_text: "Это не жизнь, Идира. Лучше прожить отведенный срок по своим правилам, чем провести вечность так, как собралась это сделать ты!"

traits.locale_text: "This is not life, Idira. It is better to live what time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"
"This is not life, Idira. It is better to live what time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"
"This is not life, Idira. It is better to live what time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"
"This is not life, Idira. It is better to live what time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"
"This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"
"This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"

languages.text: 「こんなの生きているとは言えない、イディラ。押し付けられた道を永遠に過ごすよりも、残された時間を自分らしく生きた方がいい！」
languages.original_text: "This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"

traits.locale_text: 「こんなの生きているとは言えない、イディラ。押し付けられた道を永遠に過ごすよりも、残された時間を自分らしく生きた方がいい！」

languages.text: “你这样根本算不上活着，伊迪拉。就算是按照自己的方式轰轰烈烈地赴死，也比在痛苦之中永远苟活要强！”
languages.original_text: "This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"

traits.locale_text: “你这样根本算不上活着，伊迪拉。就算是按照自己的方式轰轰烈烈地赴死，也比在痛苦之中永远苟活要强！”

languages.text: «Esto no es vida, Idira. ¡Es mejor pasar el tiempo que le quede haciendo lo que desee que pasar una eternidad existiendo de esa forma!».
languages.original_text: "This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"

traits.locale_text: «Esto no es vida, Idira. ¡Es mejor pasar el tiempo que le quede haciendo lo que desee que pasar una eternidad existiendo de esa forma!».

languages.text: "Das ist doch Leben, Idira. Es ist besser, die Zeit, die Euch gegeben ist, nach Euren eigenen Bedingungen zu leben ... als eine Ewigkeit zu existieren, wie Ihr es vorhabt!"
languages.original_text: "This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist doch kein Leben, Idira. Es ist besser, die Zeit, die Euch gegeben ist, nach Euren eigenen Bedingungen zu leben ... als eine Ewigkeit zu existieren, wie Ihr es vorhabt!"

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas une vie, Idira. Pourquoi ne pas exister comme vous l'entendez le temps qu'il vous reste plutôt que de passer l'éternité dans cet état ? »
languages.original_text: "This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas une vie, Idira. Pourquoi ne pas exister comme vous l'entendez plutôt que de passer l'éternité dans cet état ? »

languages.text: "Yaşamak bu değil İdira. Bu şekilde ebediyen var olmaktansa ömrünü kendi tercihlerine göre sürmek yeğdir!"
languages.original_text: "This is not living, Idira. It is better to live out the time you have on your own terms than spend an eternity existing the way you intend to!"

traits.locale_text: "Yaşamak bu değil İdira. Bu şekilde ebediyen var olmaktansa, kendi ömrünü kendi tercihlerine göre yaşamak yeğdir!"
